name: Jacdac Developer's-tool Electronic module Kit B
description:
Dive deep into the forefront of electronic interfacing with the Jacdac Elite Module Suite. Built on the bedrock of Microsoft's avant-garde Jacdac protocol, this suite aggregates an array of meticulously crafted modules, setting the gold standard for next-gen electronic projects.

It Includes:

Jacdac-Power	X1
Jacdac-Haptic Output	X1
Jacdac-Accelerometer	X1
Jacdac-Relay	X1
Jacdac-Env Sensor	X1
Jacdac-RGB Strip	X1
Jacdac-Servo	X1
Jacdac-Ultrasonic	X1
Jacdac-Hub_B	X1
Jacdac Cable  10 cm	X2
Jacdac Cable 35 cm	X2
Jacdac Cable  100 cm	X1
